timeline.message:
Fix obviously wrong boolean condition
mvn spotless apply

Signed-off-by: Christian Schlipp <christian@schlipp.de>

timeline.bodyText: Please revert this changes, it breaks the build
timeline.author: J-N-K
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText:
Strange - this was the result of mvn spotless apply...
Reverted it with the last commit

timeline.message:
revert mvn spotless apply
